definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: More running sponsorships are in the works, according to Adidas.
sentences.chinese: 据阿迪达斯透露还将为更多跑步赛事提供赞助。

sentences.english: Products the adidas Group are available in virtually every ry in the world.
sentences.chinese: 阿迪达斯集团的产品遍布在世界的每一个角落。

sentences.english: Non-marking rubber outsole and fashionable Adidas logo.
sentences.chinese: 非标橡胶鞋底，时尚阿迪达斯标志。

sentences.english: The adidas Golden Shoe is awarded to the top scorer at the FIFA World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 阿迪达斯金靴奖是授予世界杯最佳射手的一个奖项。

sentences.english: Dress blue Jeans and Adidas slipers at promotion convention.
sentences.chinese: 在推广会穿蓝牛仔裤，阿迪达斯凉拖。

sentences.english: Few people can afford to pay 100,000 toman [$100] to buy an Adidas T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没人买得起100美元一件的阿迪达斯T恤衫。

sentences.english: In Germany, Adidas "fringe lawsuit" also continue to occur.
sentences.chinese: 在德国以外，阿迪达斯的“条纹讼事”也不断发生。

sentences.english: Nike ( NKE - news - people ) and Adidas ( ADDDY.PK - news - people ) have started relocating their sneaker factories to Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 耐克和阿迪达斯开始把运动鞋工厂搬往印度尼西亚。

sentences.english: Nike is suing its German competitor, and Chinese soccer star Zheng Zhi.
sentences.chinese: 耐克起诉德国阿迪达斯公司以及中国球星郑智。

sentences.english: I want a pair of sports shoes, Adidas.
sentences.chinese: 我想买双运动鞋，要阿迪达斯牌的。

sentences.english: The adidas T-MAC III is the core baller's basketball shoe.
sentences.chinese: 阿迪达斯的麦迪三是核心球员的篮球鞋。
